H0.text: when is the fa cup semi-finals being played. Old Trafford

H1.text: when is the fa cup semi-finals being played. Tottenham Hotspur Stadium

H3.text: when is the fa cup semi-finals being played. Wembley Stadium

A4.text: The final was played at Wembley Stadium, London, on 17 May 2025.

A5.text: The draw was made on 30 March 2025 by Joe Hart at Deepdale.

A6.text: The semi-finals have been played exclusively at the rebuilt Wembley Stadium since 2008.
